code: import{FILM_SCORE}from'../../const';import{useAppSelector}from'../../hooks';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ratingFilm={BAD:3,NORMAL:5,GOOD:8,VERY_GOOD:10};function Overview(){var currentFilm=useAppSelector(function(state){return state.currentFilm;});var filmScore=function filmScore(film){if(film.rating<=ratingFilm.BAD){return FILM_SCORE.BAD;}else if(film.rating>ratingFilm.BAD&&film.rating<=ratingFilm.NORMAL){return FILM_SCORE.NORMAL;}else if(film.rating>ratingFilm.NORMAL&&film.rating<=ratingFilm.GOOD){return FILM_SCORE.GOOD;}else if(film.rating>ratingFilm.GOOD&&film.rating<ratingFilm.VERY_GOOD){return FILM_SCORE.VERY_GOOD;}else if(film.rating>=ratingFilm.VERY_GOOD){return FILM_SCORE.AWESOME;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"film-rating",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"film-rating__score",children:filmScore(currentFilm)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"film-rating__meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"film-rating__level",children:currentFilm.rating}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"film-rating__count",children:[currentFilm.scoresCount," ratings"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"film-card__text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:currentFilm.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"film-card__director",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Director: ",currentFilm.director]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"film-card__starring",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Starring: ",currentFilm.starring]})})]})]});}export default Overview;
